rows.label: tlk41310141_04_msg0001
rows.name:
The reason I'm alive today
is thanks to Vandham-san.

rows.label: tlk41310141_04_msg0002
rows.name:
If it were Vandham-san, I don't
think he would have just left the
immigrants to fend for themselves.

rows.label: tlk41310141_04_msg0003
rows.name:
That's why I've decided to accept the
immigrants. Though I'd rather not get
involved with people from Superbia.
